summary: Antonio Frau is a formerly convicted killer who, while having an active sex life with his buxom wife Francisca who also cheats on him with her older doctor, becomes a serial killer/rapist of women.
cast: Fernando Acaso|María José Bausá|Raquel Arenas|Xènia Reguant|Sonia Moreno|Alejo Sauras|Martín Garrido Ramis|Mark San Juan|Miquel Sitjar|Ruperto Ares|Ramón G. del Pomar|Elena Seguí|Miquel Fernández|Ángel Alarcón|Antonio Mayans|Gonzalo Bouza
title: H6: Diario de un asesino
